author: Ryan Lytle
comment: My only issue with this app is that I can't get my promo codes from the app. I can see how many rewards I have accrued but have to log into my account from a PC to actually retrieve the codes to use. I also don't like the fact that you have to book a rewards tee time 3 days in advance as I often decide to play a round last minute. Other than that I like the interface etc. so I gave it 4 stars.

author: William McAteer
comment: Downloaded app and rec'd a very nice price quote, went thru all the steps to finalize booking and was told the low rate was no longer available. Seems like a scam to me, a little bait and switch.

author: Duke Williams
comment: It used to work great. Now it stinks, and so does their customer service! I get an error any time I try to book. I've uninstalled and reinstalled but it still doesn't work. I reported it to them 3 times and have been ignored. Totally unacceptable!

author: Christopher Clark
comment: I had an account through Amazon and I went to log in and it wouldn't allow it and then that whole feature disappeared. And then I received some type of message saying if I buy one hot deal today I would get 3 free and I look in mind rewards and I have 0 points and I don't even have a way to contact their system for help

author: Sunrise NETWORKING
comment: Every freaking day when I finish a round of golf, I go to GolfNow, and book the next day's golf. ALL the best courses...I never leave home without this app. Shame on you if your are paying full price. I became a VIP member.

author: Scott Pement
comment: Golf Now charged me Twice for one round of golf, and has not refunded the additional charge after having been notified of the mistake.  Charged $25.96 X 2 = $51.92. Notified Golf Now Jan 26, 2018 and Jan 30, 2018 of the error, and have yet to be refunded the over-charge.

author: Allen Kadilis
comment: GolfNow Stole My Money! I know I don't post a lot but I wanted to give fair warning to the golfers out there. GolfNow basically just stole $160 from me for canceling 5 days in advance do the weather concerns. They canceled my reservation at the course but are not returning any of the money involved so they are charging me for basically nothing. I have escalated several calls up to management only to be told I could be sent some golf balls and have expiring credits I cannot use. It's 20° out and raining not the most ideal conditions for a good game of golf. I didn't know a company like GolfNow could take your money for zero service provided! I will never use them again and advise all golfers not to either. # GolfNow
Don't ever book a round anymore without going through GN not only cause I'm a VIP member but I get the best deals by far

author: Nathan Brinkley
comment: The app doesn't have a direct phone number to contact customer service if you have an issue you can only go through the reservations also the app doesn't update while you're on the golf course if you use the GPS it takes forever for the GPS to update and it's manually Advanced from one hole to the next

author: JK Harrison
comment: What happened to the GOLF BIDS APP ?  I guess it was shut down, bad idea. GOLF NOW fees and pricing are never the real price. I have been called a few times by their call center saying sorry the tee time you booked was taken. I have had enough of GN and their other apps. I will use a few other apps that have not been sucked up by GN.. Stay away from all GOLF NOW apps.  1/1/2018

author: Big Perm
comment: To modify a tee time it said select Customer Service, so I did. Under Customer Service it said you must call us, but there is no phone number to be found anywhere. It took me 10 minutes to find a contact phone number, even Google had a hard time finding it. Finally I called, and they were closed at 3:30 pm! What kind of business makes you work this hard just to speak with someone, and then be closed during normal business hours?! I thought I set my tee time via the golf course, didn't even know it used a 3rd party, and the golf course says I have to call Golfnow because they can't do anything. I should have called the course instead of using this worthless company that charged me $5.40 for nothing!!! Worst app EVER!

author: Dan Rodgers
comment: Why pay to book with this when I can call the course myself for the same price minus the booking fee? Even hot deals not so hot after adding booking fees to ot.

author: joshua vargas
comment: Golf now messed up my tee time and i paid for it I won't use anymore especially since I received no compensation except my fees and had to pay extra to golf

author: Scott Garcia
comment: Terrible customer service. If you want to cancel your tee time then count on being on hold for an hour

author: David Choi
comment: Do not use this app, it's horrible for the following reasons:  1. Prices are MUCH HIGHER than other apps (Try TeeOff) 2. App's default date for tee time is 2 days later -- WHY?  Why not 1 day, why not just be blank? 3. You can't easily modify/cancel a reservation. 4. You will be on hold on the customer service number FOR EVER -- Obviously because of the MANY satisfied customers. 5. When I finally got to talk to someone in customer service, explaining my issue, he agreed to credit me for the reservations (after explaing it about 10 times) -- Guess what, I GOT NO CREDIT!!  HORRIBLE -- Will be deleting the app and never using it again.  I hate it so much, I doubt I'll be able to resist telling random people I play golf with (I have a flexible schedule, so yes, Golf Now folks, I often book tee times for the VERY NEXT DAY, not just 2 days out, and sometimes even sooner).  Hey GolfNow -- GET a clue, there's lot of better competition out there that doesn't spend all their money on marketing, like you obviously do.  Savvy consumers will find them and stop using your crappy service.

author: James Pizzola
comment: Fantastic app have gotten on course near me for a 3rd of the price. Walk in the pro shop walking out and on the tee box. Its a great app

author: Nikhil Kapur
comment: Funtionality is nice but the user experience of the app is horrible. They need to find new developers and redesign it from the ground up.

author: Paul Muller
comment: Great for making discounted tee times. I just wish it would default the search criteria to my last View and Sort settings.

author: Rob F
comment: Booking bugs. Authentication error when trying to book even when logged in.  Customertoken value not found.  Galaxy s8

author: Michael Whaley
comment: This app has saved me hundreds if not thousands of dollars.  A must for any golfer!
Cannot get app to work ! The app sends me emails for tee times but will not let me access GPS ?

author: Jordan Stiles
comment: Scheduled a tee time and course was closed due to weather. Never refunded after submitting a support ticket. Never even heard back from GolfNow. AVOID!
Great  app for booking t-times at a great rates.

author: Hum Bounyasane
comment: Can't ever modify or cancel on the app always have to call to make changes.

author: William Clark
comment: This App is great for scheduling tee times, especially when I am traveling

author: Ken Fox
comment: Too many errors while using program.

author: Chris Sakaguchi
comment: No way to contact customer service by phone. Otherwise it works great.

author: Paul Long
comment: Would not be without the golf now app......fantastic

author: Logan Brown
comment: Can't even get help to cancel or to modify a reservation. Don't waste your money on convenience fees.
This app saves money period! Hit em straight...

author: John Velarde
comment: Love this app.easy to use great deals.I look at it every day just to see what's out there.
Hasn't work for me yet.

author: Rob Tweeddale
comment: Great app for getting tee times, tracking your scores and pretty accurate GPS

author: Javier Limones
comment: I don't know if its just lack of participants on the courses in Corpus Christi, or a glitch in the app

author: Riaz Alam
comment: Used to crash frequently previously but now works.fine now.

author: Regina Delosantos
comment: I've really like this app cause my husband them doe's the golfing but I'd rather go putting.

author: M Hinklin
comment: Great app, great GPS! Scoring and tee times are great!
Used to be a great app to find cheap golf. Not anymore. I stopped using golfnow.

author: Meat Head
comment: Only thing I love more than Golfing is Golfing for less money ha ! Great app, thank you !!!

author: Samuel King Jr
comment: Saves me money and time. What's better then that.
